title: CalculationSetup

calculationType.description: The type of calculation that should be performed.

target.description: The product system or process that should be calculated.

impactMethod.description: The LCIA method for the calculation.

nwSet.description: The normalisation and weighting set for the calculation.

parameters.description: A list of parameter redefinitions that should be used in the calculation.

allocation.description: The calculation type to be used in the calculation.

withCosts.description: Indicates whether life cycle costs should be also calculated.

withRegionalization.description: Indicates whether a regionalized result should be calculated or not.

numberOfRuns.description: This field is only valid when this setup describes a Monte Carlo simulation and contains the number of simulation runs in that case.

description: A setup for a product system calculation.
